mapper.update: update sc_login_user set log_cnt = log_cnt + 1, log_date = now() where user_id=#{userId}

insert into sc_login_user( user_id, login_name, password,gender, mobilePhone, email, officeTel,DATE_START, STAFF_ID, STATE ) values( #{userId}, #{loginName}, #{password}, #{gender}, #{mobilePhone}, #{email}, #{officeTel}, now(), #{staffId}, #{state} )
mapper.select: select a.menu_id "id", menu_pid "pid", menu_name "text", b.menu_id "id2", c.menu_id "id3" from sc_menu a left join (select distinct (m.menu_id) from sc_menu m, role_user_rela a, role_menu_rela b where a.role_id = b.role_id and b.menu_id = m.menu_id and a.user_id = #{userId} ) b on a.menu_id = b.menu_id left join (select r.menu_id from user_menu_rela r where r.user_id = #{userId} ) c on a.menu_id = c.menu_id order by a.menu_order, a.menu_id
select password from sc_login_user where user_id=#{userId}
mapper.update: update sc_login_user set password = #{password} where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select login_name "login_name", log_date "log_date", staff_id "staff_id", state "state", log_cnt "log_cnt", date_start "date_start", date_end "date_end", '北京睿思科技有限公司' as "company" from sc_login_user a where user_id = #{userId}
